content.text:
# Ultimate Song Chart Awards Presentation 2021

The Ultimate Song Chart Awards Presentation 2021 () was held at the AsiaWorldâ€“Expo on 1 January 2022. It recognized the best Cantopop recordings, compositions, and artistes of the eligibility year.
Winners
won "Best Male Singer" award.|alt=Close-up shot of Hins Cheung holding a microphone in his right hand and waving to the audience with his left hand]]
won "Best Female Singer" award.|alt=Close-up shot of Joyce Cheng waving with her left hand]]
, as group and individuals, won eight awards.|alt=Front view of Mirror members at their concert wearing black t-shirts and jeans]]
